about_the_game:
IGF-nominated composer and sound artist Eli Rainsberry (No Longer Home, A Monster's Expedition) presents a musically hybrid score and soundscape guided by the spaces and characters of Saltsea Chronicles.

All tracks composed, produced and mixed by Eli Rainsberry.
Album artwork by Nils Deneken.

Tracks 9 and 77 features instrumental performances from the following good folks, please consider supporting them and their own music! Special thanks to them, as well, for advice on sections of its notation:

M Gewehr (drum arranging, bass)
TV-MA (flute)
Tyler Mire (trumpet)

name: Saltsea Chronicles OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 4 GB available space
